Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Methods
org.apache.hivemind.test.HiveMindTestCase.fabricateLocation(int)
          To be removed in 1.2. Use HiveMindTestCase.newLocation() instead. 
org.apache.hivemind.service.ClassFabUtils.getInstanceClass(Object, Class)
          Please use version which takes a ClassFab object. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.apache.hivemind.impl.MessageFormatter(Log, Class, String)
          in 1.2, to be removed in a later release. Use MessageFormatter.MessageFormatter(Class, String) instead. 
org.apache.hivemind.impl.MessageFormatter(Log, ResourceBundle)
          in 1.2, to be removed in a later release. Use MessageFormatter.MessageFormatter(ResourceBundle) instead. 
org.apache.hivemind.impl.MessageFormatter(Log, String)
          in 1.2, to be removed in a later release. Use MessageFormatter.MessageFormatter(String) instead.
